'''Greg Penderglas''' is a patient at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]].

==History==
Greg came into the ER of [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]] newly insured with abdominal pain that his wife said he'd had off and on for at least the ten years they'd been married. A mass was revealed. A CT showed that the mass was a fetus in fetu, a twin that Greg enveloped in the womb.

That fetus was determined to be the cause of Greg's pain, so they scheduled surgery to remove it. However, Greg refused consent for the surgery, saying it was rare and special, so he wanted to keep it. Richard convinced him to let them remove it, but offered to let him keep it afterward.

Upon seeing the removed fetus in the tub, Greg screamed and begged them to take it away.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He has been married to [[Jodi Penderglass]] for ten years.

==Career==
He is a junk collector who sells things at flea markets. His job led him to be excited about the absorbed twin he'd been carrying in his abdomen.

==Notes and Trivia==
*His case was the first fetus in fetu any of the doctors at GSM had seen in their careers.
*Richard kept the fetus removed from Greg's abdomen for his collection of weird things pulled out of patients.
